Pre-Game Insights: The Athletics have won 11, or 73.3%, of the 15 games they've played as favorites this season.
Oakland has a record of 11-4 in games when oddsmakers favor them by at least -115 on the moneyline.
The oddsmakers' moneyline implies a 53.5% chance of a victory for the Athletics.
The Tigers have come away with 39 wins in the 85 contests they have been listed as the underdogs in this season.
Detroit has a win-loss record of 35-44 when favored by -105 or worse by sportsbooks this year.
The Tigers have an implied victory probability of 51.2% according to the moneyline set for this matchup.
The Athletics have not been the moneyline favorite over the last 10 games.
In their last 10 outings (all 10 of them had set totals), the Athletics and their opponents combined to go over the run total seven times.
The Athletics have gone 7-3-0 against the spread over their past 10 games.
